General.Name: Annum Bhd
General.Description: Annum Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and trading of veneer and plywood products. The company is also involved in the purchase and sale of veneer, plywood, and decorative plywood products; general trading of plywood products; construction, project management, and its related activities, including engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning; manufacture of construction materials; and provision of IT related services. It operates in Malaysia, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Cymao Holdings Berhad. Annum Berhad was founded in 1960 and is based in Sandakan, Malaysia.
